title: Text Preprocessing Toolbox
description: This tool is for people who work a lot with text. It allows a quick text cleaning and normalization.
It has easy and intuitive User Interface.
You can remove HTML Tags, punctuation, numbers, URLs, emojis, or stopwords. You can normalize
characters, correct spelling, lemmatize, and stem.
techStack: Python, JavaScript, Flask, React, nltk, RegEx, Heroku

title: Hot Dog Challenge
description: The second Full Stack Machine Learning project I built. This time I trained a Deep Learning model.
Deploying it on Heroku turned out to be very challenging.
I faced multiple memory issues. I solved most of them using tf-lite.
techStack: Python, JavaScript, Flask, React, Tensorflow, Keras, Heroku

title: Full Stack Iris App
description: The first ever Full Stack Machine Learning project I created.
My goal was to connect all the dots required to make it work
techStack: Python, JavaScript, Flask, React, Scikit-learn, Numpy, Heroku
